member.name: M:AuditX.SAPHelper.LockUser(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to lock the supplied user via BAPI. Returns True on success. outMessage contains any message returned by the BAPI or error text.

member.name: M:AuditX.SecurityHelpers.EncryptString(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a plaintext string using DPAPI (CurrentUser). Returns base64 ciphertext.

member.name: M:AuditX.SecurityHelpers.DecryptString(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to decrypt a base64 ciphertext previously created with . If decryption fails (value was plain text or corrupted) the original value is returned.

member.name: M:AuditX.FileUtils.GetUniqueFileName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a unique file name by appending (1), (2), etc., before the extension if needed.
member.param: The folder where the file should be saved
member.returns: Full file path with unique name

member.name: M:AuditX.Logger.InitializeLog(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the log file path with control ID and current user

member.name: M:AuditX.Logger.LogMessage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes a message to the log file with timestamp
member.param: True for success, False for error

member.name: M:AuditX.Logger.LogException(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Logs an exception with full details (message, source, stacktrace)

member.name: M:AuditX.Logger.OpenLogFolder
member.summary: Opens the log folder (C:\Void\Logs) in File Explorer

member.name: M:AuditX.Logger.CreateFolderPath(System.String)
member.summary: Ensures the full folder path exists by creating missing directories

member.name: M:AuditX.MouseHoverHandler.ApplyHoverEffect(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Drawing.Color,System.Windows.Forms.Cursor,System.Drawing.Size)
member.summary: Applies hover effect to a control. Includes background color, cursor, optional size increase.
member.param: Control to apply hover effect to

member.name: M:AuditX.ctrlGeneral.CopyFileToAppDirectoryWithSuffix(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String)
member.summary: Copies the specified file to the application's startup directory. If a file with the same name exists, prompts the user to overwrite. Returns the relative path to the copied file, or Nothing if canceled or failed.
member.param: The window that owns any dialog boxes shown.
The full path of the file to copy.
member.returns: The relative path to the copied file (e.g., ".\filename.ext") if successful; otherwise, Nothing.
